meanings.definition: Living together in the same household.
meanings.sent1: My grandparents' coresidential arrangement brings them joy and companionship.
meanings.sent2: Cousins sharing a home is an example of coresidential living.
meanings.sent3: The coresidential setup of the siblings led to many shared meals and laughter.
meanings.sent4: In the cozy coresidential space, family bonds grew stronger.
meanings.sent5: The concept of coresidential living promotes togetherness and support.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the act of residing together in the same place.
meanings.sent1: The coresidential agreement between the roommates outlined shared responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The coresidential community organized regular events for all residents.
meanings.sent3: The coresidential policy made sure everyone felt included and valued.
meanings.sent4: The coresidential bond among neighbors created a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: The coresidential nature of the dormitory fostered a sense of belonging.
